page.title: 05COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: There are two postal collections and one delivery from Monday to Friday with one collection and delivery on Saturdays. The postcode is Ipswich based, and the postal town is Halesworth. More than half the households are on the telephone. From a distance of about 30km the Subscriber Trunk Dialling Code is 098683. Village events are advertised on two official notice boards in the village, in the shop and the church porch. They will also be found in the Community News and Church magazine. Word of mouth remains the fastest, if not the most accurate means of communication.
